Selected Projects

Drop markdown files in src/content/projects/ to populate this page. A simple header and paragraph per project works well.

A New Era of Data Analysis in Baseball

Explored MLB Statcast data; compared players using derived performance metrics and visuals.

A Visual History of Nobel Prize Winners

Kaggle dataset exploration of Nobel laureates; insightful charts and discussion.

Analyze International Debt Statistics (SQL)

SQL exploration of World Bank international debt data; clear queries and insights.

Analyzing American Baby Name Trends (SQL)

Rankings and trend analysis over 100+ years of baby names.

Analyzing NYC Public School Test Scores (SQL)

Summary stats and filters to analyze NYC school performance.

Analyzing TV Data — Super Bowl

Python analysis of Super Bowl TV ratings, ads, and viewership trends with visuals.

Arduino Temperature Warning System IoT

NTC-thermistor based temperature monitor with LED alerts; simple IoT-ready sketch and wiring diagram.

ASL Recognition with Deep Learning

CNN classifier for American Sign Language hand gestures with evaluation plots.

Bad Passwords and the NIST Guidelines

Checked password strength/compliance with NIST guidance; simple scoring functions and examples.

Bank Account Simulator

Intro OOP exercise:- deposit/withdraw with simple validation and status display.

Battery Monitoring & Control IoT Device

PIC16F887 + A6 GSM/GPRS based battery monitoring/control device with IoT telemetry.

Classify Song Genres from Audio Data

Genre prediction using classical ML over audio features; clean baseline with confusion matrix.

Credit Card Validator

Utility to validate credit card numbers (e.g., Luhn algorithm).

Customer Churn Prediction in a Telecom Company

End-to-end churn modeling:- EDA, feature engineering, model selection, and business metrics for a telecom case study.

Data-Driven Insights for Donor Selection

ML insights for a national charity:- donor propensity modeling and campaign targeting with uplift-style thinking.

Disney Movies and Box Office Success

Regression analysis of Disney movies to explore drivers of box office success.

Do Left‑handed People Really Die Young?

Bayesian analysis on handedness vs. life expectancy; critical discussion of data selection effects.

Dr. Semmelweis and the Discovery of Handwashing

Re-analysis of a landmark medical dataset demonstrating the impact of hand hygiene.

E-Commerce Recommender System

Production-ready, modular recommender with popularity, item-to-item, and cart-aware hybrid strategies over RetailRocket data; batch + streaming simulation; Streamlit UI.

Exploring the Bitcoin Cryptocurrency Market

Explored cap/returns of major cryptocurrencies; tidy charts and summary stats.

Exploring the Evolution of Linux

Used VCS data to chart Linux project evolution; contributors, commits, and timelines.

Exploring the History of Lego

Historical exploration of LEGO sets and themes with visualizations.

Exploring the NYC Airbnb Market

Analyzed host, price, and location patterns in NYC Airbnb listings.

Find Movie Similarities from Plot Summaries

NLP-based similarity over movie plot summaries; cosine similarity on embeddings/TF‑IDF.

Fine-Tune BERT for Text Classification

Finetuned BERT with TensorFlow for supervised text classification; reproducible training loop and evaluation.

GE:- Automate the Landing of an Aircraft

Aviation simulation project:- control/system design for automated landing sequences.

Generating Keywords for Google Ads

Automated keyword generation with Python; cleaning, stemming, and combinatorics.

Hyperparameter Tuning with Keras Tuner

Guided project:- use Keras Tuner to search model hyperparameters and compare trials.

Investigating Netflix Movies and Guest Stars in The Office

EDA on Netflix titles plus a fun dive into 'The Office' guest stars.

Mobile Games A/B Testing — Cookie Cats

Statistical analysis of an A/B test; draws clear product conclusions with visuals.

Naïve Bees:- Image Loading and Processing

Data pipeline for bee images; basic augmentation and sanity checks.

Naïve Bees:- Predict Species from Images

CNN species classifier for honey bees vs bumble bees; tidy training loop.

Name Game:- Gender Prediction using Sound

Playful analysis of names and phonetics; model to predict gender distribution.

Object Localization with TensorFlow

CNN-based object localization with bounding boxes; dataset prep and evaluation notebook.

Optimizing Online Sports Retail Revenue (SQL)

SQL deep-dive on product and revenue drivers for an e-commerce store.

Predicting Credit Card Approvals

ML model to predict credit approval outcomes; interpretable features and metrics.

Recreating John Snow's Ghost Map

Geo-plot recreation of the 1854 cholera outbreak map; nice historical visualization.

Reducing Traffic Mortality in the USA

Policy/data exploration on traffic deaths; trend analysis and evidence-backed suggestions.

Staff Management API

Java Spring Boot REST API for managing employees; clean controller/service layers; JSON responses and basic persistence.

Stock Monitor

Real-time stock tracker with basic analytics and alerts; emphasizes clean data fetch, caching, and visual summaries.

Streamlining Employee Data

Dataframes exercise:- joins/aggregations to merge employee data from multiple sources.

Superhero Name Generator with TensorFlow

RNN text-generation mini-project that creates superhero-style names.

The Android App Market on Google Play

EDA of scraped Google Play data to surface category trends and rating dynamics.

The GitHub History of the Scala Language

Mining Git/GitHub data to identify Scala experts and contribution history.

The Hottest Topics in Machine Learning

NLP topic modeling over ML abstracts; trend plots over time.

Tweet Emotion Recognition

NLP pipeline to classify emotions in tweets with TensorFlow; includes preprocessing and model evaluation.

What & Where are the World's Oldest Businesses

Join-heavy SQL/Python exploration to identify extremely long-lived firms.

When Was the Golden Age of Video Games (SQL)

Join/set-theory queries to determine top years in gaming history.

Which Debts Are Worth the Bank's Effort?

Econometrics-flavored analysis to prioritize debt collection using discontinuity effects.

Who Is Drunk and When in Ames, Iowa?

EDA of breath alcohol test data to reveal time/location patterns.

Who’s Tweeting? Trump or Trudeau?

Writing Functions for Product Analysis
